text: Emilie Sandra Deal (née Dunagan; 1941 or 1942 – August 23, 2022) was an American education activist and public school language arts teacher. She was the wife Governor of Georgia Nathan Deal. She was the First Lady of Georgia from 2011 to 2019. Deal was born in Gainesville, Georgia. Deal died on August 23, 2022 from breast cancer at her home in Demorest, Georgia at the age of 80. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from breast cancer Category:American teachers Category:American activists Category:Republicans (United States) Category:Writers from Georgia (U.S. state)
title: Sandra Deal
